name: Paradise Architect: Idle Tycoon
description:
At the beginning of the game you are given a small piece of land on the island, which you must turn into a thriving city. You can choose which buildings to build - residential, commercial or industrial.



The more your city grows, the more people come to your island, and the more development opportunities you have. You can improve roads and transportation systems, build parks and entertainment centers to make your city more attractive for residents.



The aim of the game is to create a prosperous city that attracts new residents and businessmen and brings you profit. If you love strategy games and dream of becoming the mayor of your own city, then Paradise Architect: Idle Tycoon is exactly what you need.
